sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('Update ' ,pipeline().parameters.schema,'.',pipeline().parameters.table_job_run_log, ' set records_copied = ' , activity('Copy_data_Landing_to_Temp_Table').output.rowsCopied ,  ',' ,  ' records_read = ' , activity('Copy_data_Landing_to_Temp_Table').output.rowsRead , ' where  job_key = ' ,activity('LKP_Job_Key_Export').output.firstRow.job_key, ' and job_run_key =' , activity('LKP_Job_Run_Log_Export').output.firstRow.job_run_key, ';select 0 as DummyValue;')

@concat('Update ' ,pipeline().parameters.schema,'.',pipeline().parameters.table_job_run_log, ' set records_copied = ' , activity('Copy_data_Landing_Temp_Table_Exclusion').output.rowsCopied ,  ',' ,  ' records_read = ' , activity('Copy_data_Landing_Temp_Table_Exclusion').output.rowsRead , ' where  job_key = ' , activity('LKP_Job_Key_Exclusion').output.firstRow.job_key, ' and job_run_key =' , activity('LKP_Job_Run_Log_Exclusion').output.firstRow.job_run_key, ';select 0 as DummyValue;')

@concat('Update ' ,pipeline().parameters.schema,'.',pipeline().parameters.table_job_run_log, ' set records_copied = ' , activity('Copy_from_raw_to_Temp_Table_Substitution').output.rowsCopied ,  ',' ,  ' records_read = ' , activity('Copy_from_raw_to_Temp_Table_Substitution').output.rowsRead , ' where  job_key = ' , activity('LKP_Job_Key_Substitution').output.firstRow.job_key, ' and job_run_key =' , activity('LKP_Job_Run_Log_Substitution').output.firstRow.job_run_key, ';select 0 as DummyValue;')
